sentence.Network_en: His message was received with unconcealed anger.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的口信引起了公开的愤怒。

sentence.Network_en: She regarded him with amazement unconcealed.
sentence.Network_cn: 她对他表示了掩饰不住的惊恐.

sentence.Network_en: Her unconcealed hostility poisoned the atmosphere.
sentence.Network_cn: 她毫无掩饰的敌意破坏了当时的气氛.

义应为无蔽状态(unconcealed)；也就是说，让事物在没有遮蔽的状态下被看。然

entry.tran: 不加掩饰的；表露无遗的
entry.def: An unconcealed emotion is one that someone has made no attempt to hide.

example.ex: His message was received with unconcealed anger.
example.tran: 他的口信引起了公开的愤怒。
他们对彼此毫不掩饰的嫌恶之情

auth_sentence.content: "I'm going to have a piece of the profits from the show," Curtis said last month, with unconcealed delight.
